column5: Man that final race of the 2011 NASCAR season was awesome!!!! What a great chase this year!!!! Congrats to Tony and Carl you gave us a great ride all the way to the last lap of the season. Tied in points at 2403 and Tony winning the championship by virtue of 5 chase victories.
Yep, excellent race and season.  Tony Wins  That's my boy!!!1
im just glad to see som1 other than jimmie johnson take it, woulda been nice to see carl win it as he's never won before but tony defiantly earned it after what he did in the chase

I recorded it and just ended up watching it last night!  Wow!!!  I couldn't turn it off.  Stayed up til 2am.  Tony Stewart was a monster!!!!!  ( ..and I'm an Edwards fan )  I've never seen anyone keep coming back from so much adversity in one race.  His re-starts were amazing and drove the heck out of his car.  PS.. Congratz Joey, I'm sure you celebrated!

As a long time Nascar fan im just glad its over. For some reason and im not to sure why, this year just seemed to drag on forever...I do however have to congradualte Tony Stewart for his big win this year..

Was a great race and will be remembered for a while.Carl and Tony are my two favorite drivers and I'm glad the settled it on the track without controversy.Neither of them left anything on the track and the best driver won. Joe
